body:
Hello everyone.
Recently we have seen a rise in the amount of inappropriate jokes.
These types of jokes include
  • Ebola jokes.
  • Cancer jokes.
  • Diabetic jokes.
  • Religious jokes.
  • Racist jokes.
  • Homosexual jokes.
  • Sexist jokes.
  • Autistic jokes.
  • Rape jokes.
  • "Your Mom" jokes.
  • "17 years" jokes.
  • Suicide jokes.
If we catch anyone making such jokes in an inappropriate and disrespectful way, they will be punished accordingly.

Thanks,
The Avicus Staff team.
body_tagged:
Hello everyone.
Recently we have seen a rise in the amount of inappropriate jokes.
These types of jokes include
  • Ebola jokes.
  • Cancer jokes.
  • Diabetic jokes.
  • Religious jokes.
  • Racist jokes.
  • Homosexual jokes.
  • Sexist jokes.
  • Autistic jokes.
  • Rape jokes.
  • "Your Mom" jokes.
  • "17 years" jokes.
  • Suicide jokes.
If we catch anyone making such jokes in an inappropriate and disrespectful way, they will be punished accordingly.

Thanks,
The Avicus Staff team.
title: A message about Inappropriate Jokes.

replies.body:
Just as a general rule, please do not make jokes that could offend a particular group of people.

Also, please do not make jokes about anyone at his or her expense, at least not personally; laugh with people, not at people.
replies.body_tagged:
Just as a general rule, please do not make jokes that could offend a particular group of people.

Also, please do not make jokes about anyone at his or her expense, at least not personally; laugh with people, not at people.

replies.body: Since many of you are obviously unclear about what you can and can not say, any joke that directly attacks or makes fun of a player or a serious matter (Ebola, Cancer, Race, etc.) will not be tolerated. I was actually about to make a post like this myself. You all know what's appropriate and what's not. Let's use some common sense, here.
replies.body_tagged: Since many of you are obviously unclear about what you can and can not say, any joke that directly attacks or makes fun of a player or a serious matter (Ebola, Cancer, Race, etc.) will not be tolerated. I was actually about to make a post like this myself. You all know what's appropriate and what's not. Let's use some common sense, here.

replies.body:
In addition to this, if we see this on either the Forums, TeamSpeak, or Avicus, we will not hesitate to carry out a punishment.

The severity of the punishment will be dependant on how, where, and what kind of joke you used. In most cases however, it will be a tempban.

replies.body: If we pm inappropriate jokes to a friend. With both parties understanding it as a joke with no malicious intent. Is this able to be punished?
replies.body_tagged: If we pm inappropriate jokes to a friend. With both parties understanding it as a joke with no malicious intent. Is this able to be punished?

replies.body: ayyyyy
replies.body_tagged: ayyyyy

replies.body:
No. But you may have to explain to the mod that both parties are aware that it's just a joke. 

But considering you're messaging via PM, no-one could report you apart from you and your friend. Meaning that a mod wouldn't know unless one of you call them over deliberately. Which would be a bit weird considering there would be no need to call a mod because you'd be joking with each other.

Do you understand me? :)

replies.body:
The question has been answered now. 
Any jokes that directly attacks or humiliates another player is not tolerated.
Any jokes regarding serious matters in general is not tolerated.
(Ebola, Cancer, Race, etc.)
If you say something with malicious intent, expect an infraction.

That's it really.

The questions that have been asked recently now are being too specific and are only addressing one specific situation. The question has already been answered.



If you are joking around in chat be careful, regardless if you really are kidding because people can misinterpret anything you say.

Just be clear hen you're talking in chat, no matter what you're saying, make sure you're being clear with everyone else.

If someone does misinterpret what you're saying, explain to them what you mean and be nice about it.
replies.body_tagged:
The question has been answered now. 
Any jokes that directly attacks or humiliates another player is not tolerated.
Any jokes regarding serious matters in general is not tolerated.
(Ebola, Cancer, Race, etc.)
If you say something with malicious intent, expect an infraction.

That's it really.

The questions that have been asked recently now are being too specific and are only addressing one specific situation. The question has already been answered.



If you are joking around in chat be careful, regardless if you really are kidding because people can misinterpret anything you say.

Just be clear hen you're talking in chat, no matter what you're saying, make sure you're being clear with everyone else.

If someone does misinterpret what you're saying, explain to them what you mean and be nice about it.

replies.body:
Since many players seem to be confused, here's what I'll say. 

Although we would prefer you did not say these jokes, we will not completely restrict you from saying it. 
For example,
Saying the word "ebola" once won't give you a tempban, we will give you a verbal warning. When you start to use these jokes in a more severe, inappropriate answer, then you will be punished. 

Lately the amount of Ebola jokes and such have been getting out of hand so this thread was made just as a clarification.
replies.body_tagged:
Since many players seem to be confused, here's what I'll say. 

Although we would prefer you did not say these jokes, we will not completely restrict you from saying it. 
For example,
Saying the word "ebola" once won't give you a tempban, we will give you a verbal warning. When you start to use these jokes in a more severe, inappropriate answer, then you will be punished. 

Lately the amount of Ebola jokes and such have been getting out of hand so this thread was made just as a clarification.

replies.body: The 18+ chat rooms will be a lot less strict than the other channels, but if a player requests that you stop making jokes about a sensitive topic you must comply.
replies.body_tagged: The 18+ chat rooms will be a lot less strict than the other channels, but if a player requests that you stop making jokes about a sensitive topic you must comply.

replies.body:
It amazes me that people know almost nothing about HIV, AIDS, Cancer, Ebola, and especially Autism and are so ignorant as to joke about them. IMO Racist jokes are fine IF NO ONE TAKES OFFENSE TO THEM OR CARES. The brown people make jokes about their race at school and people will say stuff like, "brown parents" and no one will care because we're just joking around. Not even the brown people care you said that. :P 
Bottom line is that you can't just punish that if no one cared or everyone, including people of that race found it funny. Certain things have no exceptions. But certain things do. And read up a little on something before you make an ignorant joke/comment about it. 
Just imagine the life you'd have to go through of you had Autism and/or were Gay. 
You'd basically get bullied and insulted every day and probably would have little to no friends because loads of people are really shallow. How would you feel if evey day of your life you had to feel like complete shit because you were BORN that way? 

This is just common sense, think about it.
replies.body_tagged:
It amazes me that people know almost nothing about HIV, AIDS, Cancer, Ebola, and especially Autism and are so ignorant as to joke about them. IMO Racist jokes are fine IF NO ONE TAKES OFFENSE TO THEM OR CARES. The brown people make jokes about their race at school and people will say stuff like, "brown parents" and no one will care because we're just joking around. Not even the brown people care you said that. :P 
Bottom line is that you can't just punish that if no one cared or everyone, including people of that race found it funny. Certain things have no exceptions. But certain things do. And read up a little on something before you make an ignorant joke/comment about it. 
Just imagine the life you'd have to go through of you had Autism and/or were Gay. 
You'd basically get bullied and insulted every day and probably would have little to no friends because loads of people are really shallow. How would you feel if evey day of your life you had to feel like complete shit because you were BORN that way? 

This is just common sense, think about it.
